name: Infinity pacman
description:
endless pacman is a game familiar to everyone, but from a different angle. Now there are bonuses that not only give the opportunity to eat ghosts, but also wall and speed up! Speaking of opponents, their logic has been changed, as well as new patterns of behavior have been added. What makes it possible to call this game infinite? and the fact that when collecting all the coins, you can go to another location and so on without end.

control on arrows or WASD, you can also swipe.
